import React from "react"; import avarta from "../../assets/Images/avartar.jpg" import commentButton from "../../assets/Images/Icons/add_comment.svg" import "./comments.scss" const Comments = ({comments}) => { const Defaults = comments.map((comment, index) => { return (

{comment.name}

{new Date(comment.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

{comment.comment}
) }) return(

{comments.length} Comments

JOIN THE CONVERSATION
{Defaults}
) } export default Comments;
